meanings.sent1: She retold the tale to her friends.
meanings.sent2: He retold the legend with a new twist.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled as she retold the story in a silly voice.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes retold the story of her adventurous past.
meanings.sent5: The way he retold the events made them come alive in our minds.

meanings.sent1: They retold the fable during the campfire.
meanings.sent2: The bard retold the epic saga to the eager audience.
meanings.sent3: The parrot amusingly retold snippets of the conversation it overheard.
meanings.sent4: His paintings retold the history of the land in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The melody of the song retold the emotions of a lost love.
